ModMetaData.name: Meditation
ModMetaData.author: Sielfyr
ModMetaData.description:
Many nice stuff to make meditation more fleshed out like a meditation spot, some small bonus effect on meditation, a meditation breakdown and some others things. Those stuff have low impact except on pawn who are incredibly good at meditating !
You can add this mod to an existing save, all pawn will get a random meditation skill value. I don't advice to remove this Mod from a save who use it but if you still want to do it you should clear the meditation effect(hediff) and breakdown first, the meditation furniture and skill can disappear with a non game breaking error.
Some possible future change : - skygaze can use a meditative cushion - meditation in bed less effective - pawn can still chose to meditate in bedroom even if there no spot in that room
A list of what this mod add :
- a meditation spot and a meditation cushion ( in the furniture tab ) : * it design spot where you pawn can meditate * pawn can still meditate in their bedroom if there no dedicated spot * pawn favor more comfortable spot that in a meditation room or in their bedroom
- a meditation room if the room contains a meditation item : * low priority over another room type * room don't count wealth in impressiveness calculation
- a meditation skill : * mainly increase while meditating and slowly throughout other meditative activity * it determine the chance to meditate ( pain also increase the chance to meditate ) * it increase meditation effect * it increase meditation breakdown chance over another breakdown * when skill levelup the passion can increase
- meditation effect : * effect increase while meditating and decade over time doing something else * reduce pain * reduce hunger rate * reduce figth chance * increase healing speed (low) * increase immunity rate (low)
- a meditation breakdown : * it make pawn to meditate for a long time * pawn with high meditation value will have higher chance to have this breakdown * the breakdown is considered for any breakdown intensity (minor - major - extreme)
- possibility to force meditation : * can be done on meditation item * a pawn can only perform it above a minimal meditation skill
